AssociateMember.name: AssociateMember
AssociateMember.description: Grants permission to associate an account with an Amazon Inspector administrator account

BatchGetAccountStatus.name: BatchGetAccountStatus
BatchGetAccountStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about Amazon Inspector accounts for an account

BatchGetCodeSnippet.name: BatchGetCodeSnippet
BatchGetCodeSnippet.description: Grants permission to retrieve code snippet information about one or more code vulnerability findings

BatchGetFindingDetails.name: BatchGetFindingDetails
BatchGetFindingDetails.description: Grants permission to let a customer get enhanced vulnerability intelligence details for findings

BatchGetFreeTrialInfo.name: BatchGetFreeTrialInfo
BatchGetFreeTrialInfo.description: Grants permission to retrieve free trial period eligibility about Amazon Inspector accounts for an account

BatchGetMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus.name: BatchGetMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus
BatchGetMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus.description: Grants permission to delegated administrator to retrieve ec2 deep inspection status of member accounts

BatchUpdateMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus.name: BatchUpdateMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus
BatchUpdateMemberEc2DeepInspectionStatus.description: Grants permission to update ec2 deep inspection status by delegated administrator for its associated member accounts

CancelFindingsReport.name: CancelFindingsReport
CancelFindingsReport.description: Grants permission to cancel the generation of a findings report

CancelSbomExport.name: CancelSbomExport
CancelSbomExport.description: Grants permission to cancel the generation of an SBOM report

CreateCisScanConfiguration.name: CreateCisScanConfiguration
CreateCisScanConfiguration.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a CIS scan configuration

CreateFilter.name: CreateFilter
CreateFilter.description: Grants permission to create and define the settings for a findings filter

CreateFindingsReport.name: CreateFindingsReport
CreateFindingsReport.description: Grants permission to request the generation of a findings report

CreateSbomExport.name: CreateSbomExport
CreateSbomExport.description: Grants permission to request the generation of an SBOM report

DeleteCisScanConfiguration.name: DeleteCisScanConfiguration
DeleteCisScanConfiguration.description: Grants permission to delete a CIS scan configuration

DeleteFilter.name: DeleteFilter
DeleteFilter.description: Grants permission to delete a findings filter

DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.name: DescribeOrganizationConfiguration
DescribeOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS organization

Disable.name: Disable
Disable.description: Grants permission to disable an Amazon Inspector account

DisableDelegatedAdminAccount.name: DisableDelegatedAdminAccount
DisableDelegatedAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to disable an account as the delegated Amazon Inspector administrator account for an AWS organization

DisassociateMember.name: DisassociateMember
DisassociateMember.description: Grants permission to an Amazon Inspector administrator account to disassociate from an Inspector member account

Enable.name: Enable
Enable.description: Grants permission to enable and specify the configuration settings for a new Amazon Inspector account

EnableDelegatedAdminAccount.name: EnableDelegatedAdminAccount
EnableDelegatedAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to enable an account as the delegated Amazon Inspector administrator account for an AWS organization

GetCisScanReport.name: GetCisScanReport
GetCisScanReport.description: Grants permission to retrieve a report containing information about completed CIS scans

GetCisScanResultDetails.name: GetCisScanResultDetails
GetCisScanResultDetails.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all details pertaining to one CIS scan and one targeted resource

GetConfiguration.name: GetConfiguration
GetConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS account

GetDelegatedAdminAccount.name: GetDelegatedAdminAccount
GetDelegatedAdminAccount.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector administrator account for an account

GetEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration.name: GetEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration
GetEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration.description: Grants permission to retrieve ec2 deep inspection configuration for standalone accounts, delegated administrator and member account

GetEncryptionKey.name: GetEncryptionKey
GetEncryptionKey.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the KMS key used to encrypt code snippets with

GetFindingsReportStatus.name: GetFindingsReportStatus
GetFindingsReportStatus.description: Grants permission to retrieve status for a requested findings report

GetMember.name: GetMember
GetMember.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about an account that's associated with an Amazon Inspector administrator account

GetSbomExport.name: GetSbomExport
GetSbomExport.description: Grants permission to retrieve a requested SBOM report

ListAccountPermissions.name: ListAccountPermissions
ListAccountPermissions.description: Grants permission to retrieve feature configuration permissions associated with an Amazon Inspector account within an organization

ListCisScanConfigurations.name: ListCisScanConfigurations
ListCisScanConfigurations.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all CIS scan configurations

ListCisScanResultsAggregatedByChecks.name: ListCisScanResultsAggregatedByChecks
ListCisScanResultsAggregatedByChecks.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all checks pertaining to one CIS scan

ListCisScanResultsAggregatedByTargetReso.name: ListCisScanResultsAggregatedByTargetResource
ListCisScanResultsAggregatedByTargetReso.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all resources pertaining to one CIS scan

ListCisScans.name: ListCisScans
ListCisScans.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about completed CIS scans

ListCoverage.name: ListCoverage
ListCoverage.description: Grants permission to retrieve the types of statistics Amazon Inspector can generate for resources Inspector monitors

ListCoverageStatistics.name: ListCoverageStatistics
ListCoverageStatistics.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistical data and other information about the resources Amazon Inspector monitors

ListDelegatedAdminAccounts.name: ListDelegatedAdminAccounts
ListDelegatedAdminAccounts.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the delegated Amazon Inspector administrator account for an AWS organization

ListFilters.name: ListFilters
ListFilters.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about all findings filters

ListFindingAggregations.name: ListFindingAggregations
ListFindingAggregations.description: Grants permission to retrieve statistical data and other information about Amazon Inspector findings

ListFindings.name: ListFindings
ListFindings.description: Grants permission to retrieve a subset of information about one or more findings

ListMembers.name: ListMembers
ListMembers.description: Grants permission to retrieve information about the Amazon Inspector member accounts that are associated with an Inspector administrator account

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to retrieve the tags for an Amazon Inspector resource

ListUsageTotals.name: ListUsageTotals
ListUsageTotals.description: Grants permission to retrieve aggregated usage data for an account

ResetEncryptionKey.name: ResetEncryptionKey
ResetEncryptionKey.description: Grants permission to let a customer reset to use an Amazon-owned KMS key to encrypt code snippets with

SearchVulnerabilities.name: SearchVulnerabilities
SearchVulnerabilities.description: Grants permission to list Amazon Inspector coverage details for a specific vulnerability

SendCisSessionHealth.name: SendCisSessionHealth
SendCisSessionHealth.description: Grants permission to send CIS health for a CIS scan

SendCisSessionTelemetry.name: SendCisSessionTelemetry
SendCisSessionTelemetry.description: Grants permission to send CIS telemetry for a CIS scan

StartCisSession.name: StartCisSession
StartCisSession.description: Grants permission to start a CIS scan session

StopCisSession.name: StopCisSession
StopCisSession.description: Grants permission to stop a CIS scan session

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to add or update the tags for an Amazon Inspector resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to remove tags from an Amazon Inspector resource

UpdateCisScanConfiguration.name: UpdateCisScanConfiguration
UpdateCisScanConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a CIS scan configuration

UpdateConfiguration.name: UpdateConfiguration
UpdateConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update information about the Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS account

UpdateEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration.name: UpdateEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration
UpdateEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update ec2 deep inspection configuration by delegated administrator, member and standalone account

UpdateEncryptionKey.name: UpdateEncryptionKey
UpdateEncryptionKey.description: Grants permission to let a customer use a KMS key to encrypt code snippets with

UpdateFilter.name: UpdateFilter
UpdateFilter.description: Grants permission to update the settings for a findings filter

UpdateOrgEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration.name: UpdateOrgEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration
UpdateOrgEc2DeepInspectionConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update ec2 deep inspection configuration by delegated administrator for its associated member accounts

UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.name: UpdateOrganizationConfiguration
UpdateOrganizationConfiguration.description: Grants permission to update Amazon Inspector configuration settings for an AWS organization
